name: Mercat de la Boqueria
notes: Everyday except Sunday. Has an elevator. 0.5 or receipt from any of the stalls

name: Escola Massana
notes: You have to ask in the reception. There are stairs

name: CSS Raval
notes: You have to ask security. Down the hall, next to the elevator

name: Casal de Joves Calassanç
notes: Ask in reception. Name in Google Maps: Agrupament Escolta i Guia Sant Antoni Abat

name: Cabin Toilet - Outside of Parroquia de Sant Agusti
notes: Right outside the church

name: CEAR (Comissió Espanyola d'Ajuda al Refugiat)
notes: Down the hall to the left

name: Filmoteca de Catalunya - Biblioteca
notes: 2nd floor.

name: Cabin Toilet - Outside of Filmoteca de Catalunya
Cabin Toilet - Rambla del Raval
notes: 15 minutes max stay

name: Casal de Gent Gran Josep Trueta
notes: Al fondo a la derecha

name: EOI - Escola Oficial d'Idiomes de Barcelona Drassanes
Asociación de Maestros Rosa Sensat
notes: closed on weekends

name: Centro de Información y Asesoramiento para Jóvenes
category: Center of information for young people

name: Biblioteca de Catalunya
notes: Institut de Cultura / Escola Massana no public access. Was not able to find wheelchair accessible entrance at library, although it is posted

name: Casal de gent gran Josep Taradellas
Servei públic WC
notes: Hours not posted, but talked to attendant and he said roughly noon-midnight weekdays

name: Palau de la Música Catalana
notes: Access throuth the front or the cafe

address: Carrer de Sant Pere Més Baix 7
name: Biblioteca Francesca Bonnemaison
notes: Bathrooms dont't have any locks for some reasons, doors are designed without them. Bathrooms include bins at the entrance for material specifically connected with Covid

name: Cercle Artístic de Sant Lluc
notes: Access through elevator on the 1st floor. The womens bathroom is the same as the handicapped one. Almost everything in the handicapped one except for the stand aid is in bad shape.

name: Reial Cercle Artístic de Barcelona
notes: You have to ask the code at the gallery's counter then go to the restaurant on the 1st floor (its 123456). Has a handicapped toilet but its out of order.

name: Estruch
notes: It has a handicapped toilet but has some steps, making it difficult for someone in a wheelchair to actually enter.

name: Casal de Joves Autogestionat de Ciutat Vella
notes: Kind of messy, the sign of the WC is handwritten in the door of the bathroom. There is an elevator but no handicapped toilets.

name: Gerència de Seguretat i Prevenció
notes: Bathrooms are not open when the building is not receiving the public, even if security and cleaning staff are in there.

name: Teatre Poliorama
notes: The bathrooms are actually inside a theater, in the same building that is the Science Academy. Both are fully equipped. Unless you enter all the way into the theater you won't see the signage. You cannot use the bathrooms if the staff is setting up a play.

name: Cabin Toilet -
notes: 4 toilet cabin but 2/4 out of order. access for wheelchair is only possible for 2 of them as well

name: Centre de Serveis Socials Casc Antic

address: Carrer de Sant Pere Més Baix 70
name: Espai Jove Palau Alós
